objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced 77-Point AF System
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• Full HD Video Recording

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• High-performance 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in electronic viewfinder (EVF) with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3.0-inch LCD screen for versatile shooting angles
• Real-time shooting controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure, and more
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Full HD 1080p video recording capabilities
• Built-in Wi-Fi for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes to recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Fast continuous shooting up to 8.0 fps
• Weather-sealed metal body construction

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a high-contrast, modern design layout divided into quadrants with a slight grid overlay and subtle diagonal strokes for added depth. The primary visual focus is the "product_image" of a professional camera on the top right. The top left quadrant showcases the bold, large headline ("heading") in white and a striking red subheading ("subheading"), establishing brand identity. Below that, a compact tagline ("tagline") communicates the value proposition. Further down, a bullet list ("description") details the product features in an easy-to-read format. The bottom right quadrant highlights a confidently large price tag ("price") and a bold red call-to-action button ("cta") on a matching rounded rectangle background ("cta_background").

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1A1A1A` (background)
- Dark Gray: `#262626`, `#333333` (panels and accents)
- Red Accent: `#E53935` (subheading, design hints, CTA)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (text and dividing lines)
- Light Gray: `#CCCCCC` (tagline text)
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera emphasizes a sleek and professional aesthetic using a primarily monochromatic color scheme. The dominant color is matte black (#1A1A1A), covering most of the camera body and lens, signifying elegance and precision. Glossy black (#2E2E2E) highlights edges, interfaces, and buttons, adding depth and detail. White (#FFFFFF) text and markings are sharply contrasted on the dark body for readability and accentuation. Subtle metallic gray (#666666) and hints of orange (#FF9900) around the lens ring introduce dynamic accents that guide the eye. These colors blend seamlessly, enhancing both the product’s sophistication and usability.
